title: CDC reports first cruise norovirus outbreak this year, as nearly 90 people are infected
description: Nearly 90 passengers and crew fell ill with norovirus on Holland America's Rotterdam cruise ship during a Dec. 28-Jan. 9 voyage, according to CDC reports.
content:
The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) has confirmed a norovirus outbreak aboard a cruise ship this year the first one of the year that's been reported.

title: Trump's Greenland push escalates as GOP lawmaker moves to make it America's 51st state
description: House Republican introduces bill to make Greenland America's 51st state as President Donald Trump pushes for U.S. control of the strategic Danish Arctic territory.
content:
FIRST ON FOX: A House Republican is pushing for Greenland to become the country's 51st state as President Donald Trump publicly pushes for the Danish territory to come under U.S. rule.
